content: brighten any nursery with this ode to the traditional granny square it s made in squishy huggable alegria grande 1 our easy-care silky-soft worsted weight yarn we chose alegria grande in oxygen a light crisp blue-green as our main color for the contrast colors we used 9 colors of alegria grande bocados 2 for the colorful centers each bocado is a 25g mini-skein of alegria grande - a fun opportunity to play with colors for this crayon box baby blanket ///// size approx 32 x 36 materials manos del uruguay alegria grande 75% superwash merino wool 25% polyamide approx 100g / 197 yds 6 skip mc manos del uruguay alegria grande bocados 75% superwash merino wool 25% polyamide approx 25g / 49 yds 1 each of 9 colors shown in ag2349 oxygen with agb2102 juanita agb2058 turmeric agb2020 spirulina agb2363 tahiti agb2394 teal agb2419 oceano agb2600 magenta agb21905 fuchsia and agb2199 carmine us h/8 5 0mm hook or size to obtain gauge gauge approx 9 double_crochet = 2 finished square measures 3 75 notes feel free to use any hook size that produces a fabric you like but be aware that the final dimensions of your blanket and your yarn requirements may change if you vary too much from the measurements given 1 https //fairmountfibers com/collections/yarns/products/alegria-grande-1 variant=39397990170679 2 https //fairmountfibers com/collections/yarns/products/alegria-grande-bocados
